problem.p: If Owl stands closer to the edge of the diving board, will the bending moment in the diving board increase, decrease or remain the same?

choicegroup.label: If Owl stands closer to the edge of the diving board, will the bending moment in the diving board increase, decrease or remain the same?
choicegroup.choice: The bending moment will remain the same

div.p: If Owl stands closer to the edge of the diving board than the bending moment, which is maximal at the support closest to Owl, will increase. Bending moment is a function of the force (in this case the weight of Owl) and the distance (in this case the distance between Owl and the closest support). As the distance increases the moment will also increase.
